diff_hunk:

   def call(self, inputs, state):

     args = array_ops.concat([inputs, state], 1)

body: Yes, when using layer normalization we should not use bias.
body_html: Yes, when using layer normalization we should not use bias.
body_text: Yes, when using layer normalization we should not use bias.
